short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Garbage Collector finds duplicate tabs (same URL) and allows you to close them with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you opening a new tab and forget about it only to open a new "new tab" again? Is your screen not big enough to show a tab you just opened? Do you have tens of the same tabs open? If you answered "yes" to any of these questions, this extension is for you. Tab Garbage Collector finds duplicate tabs (identified by the same URL) and allows closing them with just one click delaying the fearful moment when you need to close "real" tabs to reclaim the precious tab space.
